name: full-stack-open-part-3-exercises
description: Application for the University of Helsinki Full Stack Open part 3 exercises

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../PORTFOLIO/FULLSTACK/part2/part2app2 && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../../FULL-STACK-OPEN-PART-3-EXERCISES
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Taneli Manninen
